newsitem.title: CHINA: China fixed asset investment up 13.5 pct in H1.
newsitem.headline: China fixed asset investment up 13.5 pct in H1.

text.p: China's fixed-asset investment increased by a year-on-year 13.5 percent in the first half to 741.7 billion yuan, the State Statistical Bureau said in a report issued on Tuesday.
That growth rate was down by 5.1 percentage points compared with the year-ago period, it said.
Investment in basic industries as well as in the less-developed western regions continued to strengthen, it said.
Investment in primary industry rose by 85.6 percent in the first half, it said.
Investment in western regions was up by 21.8 percent, accounting for 13.2 percent of the total nationwide, compared with 11.9 percent a year ago, it said.
